title: More bus services for Macedon Ranges
articleContent:
From Sunday 7 July 2019, the current Lancefield to Kyneton via Sunbury bus service will be split into three distinct routes and extra trips added.

Sunbury/Clarkefield to Lancefield

Extra return services on the Lancefield to Sunbury route will improve connections with Sunbury train lines - with nine return trips per day Monday to Friday and three return trips on Saturdays. 

Four weekday services from Lancefield will travel to Clarkefield, to connect to V/Line trains. Three services to Lancefield will originate at Clarkefield.

  • Weekdays – from 6.25am to 7.05pm
  • Saturday – from 8.05am to 6pm

View new Sunbury/Clarkefield to Lancefield timetable.

Gisborne to Lancefield

The Lancefield to Gisborne route will have extra services and a consistent timetable, with two return services per day, Monday to Saturday. Services from Gisborne to Lancefield will continue to Kyneton.

  • Weekdays – from 9.30am to 1.20pm
  • Saturday - from 10.50am to 3.55pm

View new Gisborne to Lancefield timetable.

Lancefield – Kyneton

The Lancefield to Kyneton route will have extra services and a consistent timetable, with two return services per day, Monday to Saturday. The service will operate from Kyneton to Lancefield via Newham. Services from Kyneton to Lancefield will continue to Romsey and Gisborne.

  • Weekdays – from 9am to 2pm
  • Saturday – from 9.35am to 1.15pm

View new Lancefield to Kyneton timetable.

The new timetables are available online and in Journey planner. To order a printed copy, call 1800 800 007.

Route map
